ValidationRule.description: Resolution to be filled in if case is closed & Resolution Plan date to be filled in if Status is Resolution Plan
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF($Profile.Name = "System Administrator", FALSE, OR( AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Non_compliance_Lodgement_Issue") ,ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolution Plan') ,ISBLANK(Resolution_Plan_Date__c)) , AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Resolution__c)),ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Resolution cannot be blank when case is closed and Resolution Plan Date cannot be blank when status is Resolution Plan
